explanation: formal; (especially in religion or law) to free someone from guilt, blame, or responsibility for something
sentence: I absolve you from all your sins.
sentence_gap: I _______ you from all your sins.

sentence: Each circle represents the location of fox den site.
sentence_gap: Each circle represents the location of fox ___ site.

sentence: He made some derogatory remark about her appearance.
sentence_gap: He made some __________ remark about her appearance.

explanation: the state of a place that is empty or where everything has been destroyed
sentence: It was difficult to describe the emptiness, the desolation of the area.
sentence_gap: It was difficult to describe the emptiness, the __________ of the area.

explanation: (of a liquid) having or producing small bubbles of gas; (of people and their behavior) excited, enthusiastic, and full of energy
sentence: Mineral water may be effervescent due to contained gases.
sentence_gap: Mineral water may be ____________ due to contained gases.

sentence: This wine has a delicious fruity flavour.
sentence_gap: This wine has a delicious ______ flavour.

explanation: wanting to discover as much as you can about things, sometimes in a way that annoys people
sentence: She could see inquisitive faces looking out from the windows next door.
sentence_gap: She could see ___________ faces looking out from the windows next door.

explanation: a small piece of metal on a door that you move down so that the door will stay closed
sentence: He lifted the latch and opened the door.
sentence_gap: He lifted the _____ and opened the door.

sentence: Mastication is the action of chewing food.
sentence_gap: ___________ is the action of chewing food.

explanation: to sell or to work regularly at something, especially at a job that involves selling things
sentence: Fishermen in small boats ply their trade up and down the coast.
sentence_gap: Fishermen in small boats ___ their trade up and down the coast.

explanation: formal; the act of remembering and showing respect for someone who has died or a past event
sentence: A church service was held in remembrance of the victims.
sentence_gap: A church service was held in ___________ of the victims.

explanation: a long, thin, metal stick put through a piece of food, especially meat, so that it can be cooked above a fire
sentence: Roast the lamb on a spit.
He was in the throes of despair after losing his job.
sentence_gap: He was in the ______ of despair after losing his job.

explanation: not clearly expressed, known, described, or decided
sentence: I do have a vague memory of meeting her many years ago.
sentence_gap: I do have a _____ memory of meeting her many years ago.

sentence: She made a veiled reference to his past mistakes.
sentence_gap: She made a ______ reference to his past mistakes.
